org.mnm.ipv4.subnet

Class ipv4SubnetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mnm.ipv4.subnet.ipv4SubnetUtils

  • public class ipv4SubnetUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    <pre> Created by martin on 04/05/17. A helper class able to validate various elements of a subnet, like a host/broadcast ip, subnet mask, or a net id </pre>

      <pre> broadcast = (id | (~mask & 255)) & 255 calculates the broadcast address of that given subnet.

      static boolean isBroadcast(int[] ip, IPv4SubnetMask mask)
      <pre> broadcast = (id | (~mask & 255)) & 255 checks if the given ip is the broadcast address of the given subnet @param ip the ip in question @param mask the subnetmask of the subnet in question @return true if the ip is the broadcast of the subnet, false if not </pre>
      static boolean isHost(int[] ip, IPv4Subnet subnet)
      <pre> host = ((subnet.mask & ip) & 255) = subnet.id checks if the ip is a host of the given subnet @param ip int[] the ip address to check @param subnet org.mnm.ipv4.subnet.IPv4Subnet the subnet in which this ip @return true if the host belongs to the subnet, false if not </pre>
      static boolean isNetID(int[] ip, IPv4SubnetMask mask)
      <pre> netID = (ip & mask) & 255 checks if a ip is the networkID of the given subnet mask @param ip int[] the ip address to check @param mask a subnet mask to check the id against @return true if the ip is the networkID, false if not </pre>

      • calcBroadcast

        public static IPv4BroadcastAddress calcBroadcast(IPv4SubnetMask mask,
                                                 IPv4NetworkID id)
        <pre> broadcast = (id | (~mask & 255)) & 255 calculates the broadcast address of that given subnet. the subnetMask networkID have to be set @param mask the subnet mask to calculate the broadcast for @param id the network id @return int[] the broadcast address </pre>
